description: This Java class, HelloController, is a Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for health check, documentation redirection, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing endpoints for greeting, documentation redirection, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message for the application.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI, preserving the request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
